game.controller

Class GameInputController

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.controller.GameInputController

  • @RestController
public class GameInputController
extends java.lang.Object

    Game input controller

    Client controller which contains all the server-client requests

      • startGame

        @PostMapping(value="/games/{id}/round/actions")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Void> startGame(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                          java.lang.String id,
                                                                                                                          @RequestBody
                                                                                                                          RoundActionInputWrapper input,
                                                                                                                          @RequestHeader(value="Secret")
                                                                                                                          java.lang.String secret)
                                                                                                                   throws IllegalAccessException
        This method receives the actions of the activation phase from the server
        Parameters:
        id - This is the id of the game
        input - This contains the order of the robot actions in a particular round
        secret - This contains the secret key in he header for communication
        Returns:
        status of the equest
        Throws:
        IllegalAccessException - if there is a mismatch in the secret header value

public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.http.HttpStatus> endGame(@RequestBody

                                                                                                                                   @PathVariable(value="id")

                                                                                                                            throws IllegalAccessException
        Informs all clients that the game has ended and why it ended.

        id - This is the id of the game
        reason - This contains the reason for ending the game
